title: Butcher
data:

**Butcher** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")-aligned and the signature [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") of [Yeenoghu](/wiki/Yeenoghu "Yeenoghu"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [triple-headed flail](/wiki/Triple-headed_flail "Triple-headed flail").

## Generation

Butcher cannot be [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for, and will revert to its base item if left in bones.

Yeenoghu is always [generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") the cursed [fireproof](/wiki/Fireproof "Fireproof") Butcher, which will have an [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment "Enchantment") ranging from +3 to +5.

## Description

Butcher has +1d5 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and +1d8 damage bonuses, and stuns monsters on hit unless they have [stun resistance](/index.php?title=Stun_resistance\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Stun resistance (page does not exist)").

## Encyclopedia entry

Legend states that the demon lord Yeenoghu himself crafted this  
triple-headed flail from the thighbone and flayed skin of an  
ancient god he slew.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Butcher\&action=edit)*

Butcher is an artifact that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. It is chaotic-aligned and the signature weapon of Yeenoghu, and its base item is a triple-headed flail.

Generation

Butcher cannot be wished for, and will revert to its base item if left in bones.

Yeenoghu is always generated with the cursed fireproof Butcher, which will have an enchantment ranging from +3 to +5.

Description

Butcher has +1d5 to-hit and +1d8 damage bonuses, and stuns monsters on hit unless they have stun resistance.

Encyclopedia entry

Legend states that the demon lord Yeenoghu himself crafted this
triple-headed flail from the thighbone and flayed skin of an
ancient god he slew.
